title: Bien Tinh Thuong - Loving Hut
description: An extension of the Loving Hut international vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai. Serves all vegan food, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts. Also sells some packaged mock meats, cooking sauces, and cookies. No English spoken but an English menu with pictures is available. Casual. Prices inexpensive by western standards.
